text: Danuta Szaflarska (6 February 1915 in Kosarzyska, Piwniczna-Zdrój, Poland - 19 February 2017 in Warsaw) was a Polish movie and stage actress. She is sometimes called the legend of Polish cinema. In 2008, she was awarded the Złota Kaczka for the best Polish actress of the century. ==Other websites== * Category:1915 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish stage actors Category:Polish radio actors
title: Danuta Szaflarska
